global_templates_page.title: Xynage powers over 2500 screens across the world
global_templates_page.short_description:
Xynage has passed several milestones within a year of its launch. Today, it powers more than 2500 screens across the globe. Developed as a bare-bones digital signage product, Xynage has several cutting edge features which make it a preferred choice for businesses and enterprises.

The main criteria for the development of the product were to ensure that it is robust, stable, and easy to deploy and manage. The solution has gone through rigorous quality testing and is being updated continuously with new features as per the market demands.
